name: Lunchbox Reverie
description:
This isn't really a game yet,  just a little zone to run around and test the character controller in. Looking for feedback on the viability of this perspective and control scheme for a Zelda-like RPG. 

Controls: Keyboard / Controller

Movement - WASD / Left Stick

Turn Camera - QE / Right Stick

Climb - F / Y

Jump - Spacebar / A

Run - Left Shift / Right Trigger

Attack - Left Click / Right Bumper (hold to chain attacks)

Block - Right Click / Left Bumper (hold)

Crouch - C

Dodge - Left CTRL / B
